text:
[Verse]
Sunny days blue skies
Feel the breeze feel the rise
No worries no cries
Underneath the open skies

[Verse 2]
Walking free hand in hand
Barefoot on golden sand
Chasing dreams across the land
Building castles out of sand

[Chorus]
Under these open skies
We’re losing track of time
Under these open skies
Life is yours and life is mine

[Verse 3]
Stars come out night falls
Hear the distant waterfall
Whispering with nature's call
Underneath the night’s shawl

[Chorus]
Under these open skies
We’re losing track of time
Under these open skies
Life is yours and life is mine

[Bridge]
Moonlit waves touch the shore
Hearts beat loud wanting more
Life’s a dance across this floor
One we’ve never felt before
title: Open Skies
